successes.title: Oculus Rift: Step Into the Game
successes.description: Developer kit for the Oculus Rift - the first truly immersive virtual reality headset for video games.

Pledges.description: SPECIAL THANKS: Help us take gaming to the next level! You'll receive a sincere thank you from the Oculus team and we'll keep you up to date on all of our progress developing the consumer Rift and building out the developer SDK!
OCULUS POSTER: A limited-edition poster for the Oculus Rift, only available via Kickstarter. See the project description for a preview!  (Please add $15 for international shipping)

OCULUS T-SHIRT: A limited edition t-shirt for the Oculus Rift, only available via Kickstarter. See the project description for a preview! You'll also receive a sincere thank you from the Oculus team. (Please add $15 for international shipping)

OCULUS T-SHIRT + POSTER: A limited edition t-shirt and poster for the Oculus Rift, only available via Kickstarter. Check out the project description for a preview! (Please add $15 for international shipping)
SIGNED OCULUS T-SHIRT + POSTER: The limited edition t-shirt and poster for the Oculus Rift, both signed by the entire Oculus team.

UNASSEMBLED RIFT PROTOTYPE KIT + DOOM 3 BFG: Try building the prototype yourself! You'll receive your own DIY kit for building the Rift from scratch, including all of individual parts for the prototype as well as instructions for assembling it by hand. It will also be shipped out a month earlier, before the official dev kits. This also includes a copy of Doom 3 BFG, and full access to the Developer Center, SDK, docs, samples, and engine integrations!   (Please add $30 for international shipping) NOTE: This DIY kit is only for true hardware geeks equipped with a hot glue gun. We encourage most of you to get the standard version below!

EARLY RIFT DEVELOPER KIT + DOOM 3 BFG: Try the Rift for yourself now! You'll receive a developer kit, perfect for the established or indie game developer interested in working with the Rift immediately. This also includes a copy of Doom 3 BFG and full access to our Developer Center for our SDK, docs, samples, and engine integrations! (Please add $30 for international shipping)

EARLY RIFT DEVELOPER KIT + DOOM 3 BFG + T-SHIRT + POSTER: A developer kit, a copy of Doom 3 BFG, access to the Oculus Developer Center, the t-shirt, and the poster, all in one exciting package!  (Please add $30 for international shipping)

SIGNED EARLY RIFT DEVELOPER KIT + DOOM 3 BFG + T-SHIRT + POSTER: A developer kit, a copy of Doom 3 BFG, access to the Oculus Developer Center, the t-shirt, and the poster- all signed by the entire Oculus team! (Please add $30 for international shipping)

2x EARLY RIFT DEVELOPER KIT + DOOM 3 BFG: You'll receive 2 developer kits (early prototype of the Rift headset), perfect for the established or indie game studio interested in working with the Rift immediately. This also includes 2 copies of Doom 3 BFG and full access to our Developer Center for our SDK, docs, samples, and engine integrations! (Please add $60 for international shipping)

3x EARLY RIFT DEVELOPER KIT + DOOM 3 BFG: You'll receive 3 developer kits (early prototype of the Rift headset), perfect for the established or indie game studio interested in working with the Rift immediately. This also includes 3 copies of Doom 3 BFG and full access to our Developer Center for our SDK, docs, samples, and engine integrations! (Please add $60 for international shipping)

5x EARLY RIFT DEVELOPER KIT + DOOM 3 BFG: You'll receive 5 developer kits (early prototype of the Rift headset), perfect for the established or indie game game studio interested in working with the Rift immediately. This also includes 5 copies of Doom 3 BFG and full access to our Developer Center for our SDK, docs, samples, and engine integrations! (Please add $100 for international shipping)

STUDIO PACK - 10x EARLY RIFT DEVELOPER KITS + PREMIUM SUPPORT EVALUATION + DOOM 3 BFG: Want your team to have access to the cutting edge of gaming? You'll receive 10 developer kits (early prototype of the Rift headset), enough for your whole team to get started developing with the Rift. Youâ€™ll also receive an evaluation of our premium support, with direct access to Oculus engineers. This also includes 10 copies of Doom 3 BFG and full access to our Developer Center for our SDK, docs, samples, and engine integrations! (Please add $150 for international shipping)

VISIT OCULUS FOR THE DAY + ALL OF THE ABOVE: We'll fly you out to the Oculus lab where you'll spend a day hanging out with the team and checking out all of our latest work (and maybe playing a few games too). You'll also receive a developer kit, a copy of Doom 3 BFG, Developer Center access, the t-shirt, and the poster, all signed by the entire Oculus team, in person. (US-residents only, sorry!)
